Name: Fort
About the game: GamePlay: Your trapped in a fort. Kill soldiers to survive. There is no way out. Features: • FPS: Fortis a first person shooter • KillCount: Keeps track of all soldiers killed • Survive: Survive as long as possible in a fort filled with enemy soldiers • PlayTime: Keeps track of how long you have played • FortLevel: Kill soldiers to raise the fort level • Score: Keeps track of your score count

Meta Description: Looking for information on Fort? Check out the release date (Aug 9, 2018), developer insights from crowgames, and a complete game summary.
